title: Maurice at the World's Fair
overview: A humorous take on a story from author/illustrator, Maurice Sendak’s childhood, produced with love by Spike Jonze, (director, Where the Wild Things Are) with Catherine Keener and friends for Maurice Sendak on his 80th birthday.
